text: Righteousness nie turning tvoj faces towards east zapad. Righteous som those verit v GOD Posledny Dni angels scripture prophets; they dat peniaze cheerfully vztazny orphans chudobny cestovat alien zobrak volny slaves they observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat;) they keep ich word whenever they robit promise they steadfastly persevere v the face z persecution hardship vojnovy! These je truthful; these bol the righteous
